TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateVisualStateAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateVisualStateAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateVisualStateAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示控制項可以處於特定狀態，而且 是控制項的 中的預期項目。

span.span: Specifies that a control can be in a certain state and that a is expected in the control's .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項作者會使用這個屬性來指定和屬於其控制項中的物件。Control authors use this attribute to specify the and objects that belong in their control's . 例如，假設您建立新的控制項有兩個名為的視覺狀態`Focused`和`Unfocused`，這是中的名為`FocusStates`。For example, suppose that you create a new control that has two visual states named `Focused` and `Unfocused`, both of which are in a named `FocusStates`. 若要指定它們可以使用這些視覺狀態的作者加入兩個屬性，將控制項的類別簽章。To specify to authors that they can use those visual states, add two attributes to the class signature of the control. 指定屬性是`FocusStates`而且屬性是`Focused`其中一個與`Unfocused`其他。Specify that the property is `FocusStates` and that the property is `Focused` for one and `Unfocused` for the other. ## Examples 下列範例示範類別簽章`NumericUpDown`控制項。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 這個範例會指定`NumericUpDown`控制項使用四個視覺狀態。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 兩個狀態，名為`Positive`和`Negative`，位於名為`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 兩個狀態，命名`Focused`和`Unfocused`，位於名為`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 對於整個範例，請參閱[建立控制項的可自訂外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#ClassAttributes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/numericupdown.cs#classattributes)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#ClassAttributes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/numericupdown.vb#classattributes)]

value.span: 狀態所屬之 的名稱。

span.span: The name of the that the state belongs to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至屬性物件。The property corresponds to the property of a object. 若要指定的項目所屬在中，設定屬性。To specify what a belongs in, set the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範類別簽章`NumericUpDown`控制項。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 這個範例會指定`NumericUpDown`控制項使用四個視覺狀態。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 兩個狀態，名為`Positive`和`Negative`，位於名為`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 兩個狀態，命名`Focused`和`Unfocused`，位於名為`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 對於整個範例，請參閱[建立控制項的可自訂外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至屬性。The property corresponds to the property of a . 若要指定的項目屬於控制項的，將屬性。To specify what belongs in a control's , set the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範類別簽章`NumericUpDown`控制項。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 這個範例會指定`NumericUpDown`控制項使用四個視覺狀態。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 兩個狀態，名為`Positive`和`Negative`，位於名為`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 兩個狀態，命名`Focused`和`Unfocused`，位於名為`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 對於整個範例，請參閱[建立控制項的可自訂外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md).
